paragraph.paragraph:
Located in the
00_introduction.xml object tool toolbar, this command
../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_delete_very_small_color.gif discards an object from the
10_object_view.xml object view . All top-level objects can be removed, except the first one, which is the object relative to the
../30_call_stack_tool/00_introduction.xml current call stack element .

Left-clicking on this button removes the selected object from the
10_object_view.xml object view , if possible. It is also possible to
../../../../../tools/eiffelstudio/reference/05_general_interface_description/10_general_interface_mechanisms/10_pick_and_drop.xml drop an object onto the button to remove the object.
